creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The documentation for IndexOptions [1] says:

"However, whenever an unprefixed keyword is processed, it clears all inherited options and any incremental settings encountered so far."

This is true for most options; however some options don't clear inherited settings. The following options don't clear inherited settings:

Charset=
Type=
DescriptionWidth=
NameWidth=
IconHeight[=] IconWidth[=]

As it happens, these options all have parameters - maybe that affects their behaviour? If this is intentional, it is not documented as far as I can tell.

[1] http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_autoindex.html#indexoptions.xhtml
